snippet: Isaiah Thomas drew blood from Justise Winslow. Other than that, most of Miami's biggest problems were self-inflicted....
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas drew blood from Justise Winslow. Other than that, most of Miami's biggest problems were self-inflicted.

headline.main: Celtics Build Huge Lead, Hang On to Beat Heat 105-95
headline.print_headline: Celtics Build Huge Lead, Hang On to Beat Heat 105-95
